basic.description: Teacher candidates will be introduced to instructional practice in the language arts.  The course will examine instructional principles for the teaching of the following components of literacy: phonemic awareness, phonics, fluency, vocabulary and reading comprehension, the writing process, the use of informational and narrative texts from JK to grade 8.  Teacher candidates will be introduced to the Ontario literacy documents and Language curriculum.
basic.subject: CURR
basic.title: Language and Literacy (PJ)
